lender.name: Sabina

I believe in helping our brothers & sisters around the globe. God has blessed us and we are put on this earth as a family and we need to hold each other up. No one should go hungry or suffer. I am inspired by all those who have asked Kiva for help and it gives me great joy to see everyone succeed, grow & change their lives !!
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in historic Tribal Art from Africa, Oceania & the Native American cultures. I also sell all types of older artwork & objects from Western cultures.

lender.name: Jennifer Fair
lender.occupational_info:
I'm an M.A. Grad student looking to advance my interests in freelance work such as writing, research, and marketing-advertising.
Global Success Opportunities is my creation and vision to allow people to access the best and most efficient marketing, success, and personal wellness programs in a less obtrusive way . . . No clutter or flashy ads.
Through Kiva, I'm seeking to make constructive contacts to help promote my interests and acquire patronage and loan funding in order to help GSO reach its potential.
Please help with a generous loan. It will be a worthwhile investment.

lender.name: TopRank
lender.occupational_info: TopRankMarketing.com is a digital marketing and public relations agency founded in 2001 and based in Minneapolis, MN. TopRank specializes in helping Fortune 1000 companies succeed on the social web through consulting, implementation and training services. Companies ranging from McKesson to Northwest Airlines trust TopRank to provide smart and profitable strategies and tactics for successful online marketing programs.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Christ loved me, gave to me, and saw value in me. Now it's my turn to pass that on.

lender.name: Tom
lender.occupational_info: Director of Student Health at the University of Mary Washington

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Rev. Leeland
lender.occupational_info: For the past years I have been working in rural Liberia helping the people of rural Liberia to grow cassava for flour production. Bong County in central Liberia have the soil for growing cassava in Liberia. As you made know, Cassava is grown in many tropical countries of the world such as Africa, Asia and Latin America. The principal markets for cassava products are in Europe - the European Economic Community being the most important for dried roots - and for cassava starch the United States, the United Kingdom and Japan. Although complete statistics of world trade in cassava products are not available, thus making it difficult to estimate the total quantity entering international trade, the import statistics of the EEC and the United States show a substantial increase in recent years, particularly for dried cassava roots. Today is is my dream to obtain $10,000.00 united state dollars to fund a factor that will produce jobs for more them 100 people living in the rural area of Liberia. For more Information you can sent us an e-mail compassion_lwa@yahoo.com

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because:
1) "Poverty is a threat to peace" - Muhammad Yunus. 2) Help from the developed worlds governments' has been... unskillful? 3) I'm Buddhist 4) It's a thrill doing something worthwhile, and with each repaid loan, I can do more good, again.
Suggested video: - Food, Inc.
Suggested books: - There Is No Me Without You, One Woman's Odyssey to Rescue Africa's Children, Melissa Fay Greene - For a Future to be Possible, Thich Nhat Hanh - The Consumer's Guide to Effective Environmental Choices (Union of Concerned Scientists) Michael Brower, Ph.D. & Warren Leon, Ph.D. - Banker to the Poor, Muhammad Yunus - Blessed Unrest, How the Largest Movement in the World Came into Being and Why No One Saw It Coming, Paul Hawken - Giving: (how each of us can change the world), Bill Clinton - The end of poverty: (economic possibilities for our time), Jeffrey D. Sachs - Hot, flat, and crowded: (why we need a green revolution- and how it can renew America), Thomas L. Friedman
lender.occupational_info: I help set up and maintain computers and the computer network so my co-workers can help people and communities recover from all kinds of disasters

lender.occupational_info: Socially conscience story-telling

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: Each of us that can should give. Especially in these troubled times.
lender.occupational_info: I do customer service. I really like my job. It is so great to be able to help out with a problem and get a resolution.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I like helping people achieve their own dreams, instead of giving them what I think they need.

lender.name: Elizabeth Johansen
lender.loan_because:
"We can't solve problems by using the same kind of thinking we used when we created them." ~Albert Einstein
"I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones." ~Albert Einstein
lender.occupational_info: The best job I could ever have!

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others, help to reduce poverty, and improve communities around the world.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and to honor those that have helped me along the way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in public interest law.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I belive in making a difference in the quality of the lives of others
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional educator and translator of languages and enjoy very much teaching and sharing with others

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: Freely I have received undeserved grace from God, freely I wish to give grace.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee a work that produces and distributes Christian resources (books, video, audio) around the world.

lender.name: Janis
lender.occupational_info: Anthropologist/Archaeologist

lender.name: Øyvor
lender.loan_because: I think that giving people the chance to build or expand their business so that they can better provide for their family is very important. This is a long term strategy that can be a good foundation for a better future for many people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student, studying media and communication, and I also work part time in a food store.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the US Navy and I travel the world on different ships.

lender.name: Athena
lender.loan_because:
its more bang for the buck! A loan is empowering, and the money can help new people over, and over again!
I also think its the greatest gift to give a loved one!
lender.occupational_info: A flight attendant, (sometimes known as air hostess) is like a security guard, nurse and waitress at the same time. We keep people safe, provide first aid, and serve drinks and snacks during airplane rides :)

lender.name: Kayla
lender.loan_because: women should actively support the success of one another.

lender.name: Matt F.
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people and lend a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I'm doing the best I can to learn a lot so I can find a way to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Pippa
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able share a little witho thers.
lender.occupational_info: Starting my own business designing web sites for other small businesses.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: Everyone benefits from kindness.
lender.occupational_info: I am a web designer and enjoy learning from the traditional arts.

lender.name: David C Barton
lender.loan_because: I believe in Humankind. People supporting people with positive motivation and good intent is what both drives and sustains us as an integrated, interdependent global culture.
lender.occupational_info: Quite satisfying in that I can often demonstrate for others what they need to do in order to accomplish a specific task beneficial both short and longterm to their livelihood.

lender.name: Valarie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams!

lender.name: Dwight
lender.loan_because: The Lord has blessed me tremendously ---- Please consider joining the Thanks Be To God Team on Kiva
lender.occupational_info: I am the CEO of Sophisticated Systems and an investor in a number of businesses.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: We have so much here. It’s important to me that I give back where it can do the most good. Kiva provides the structure that allows me to do that.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and understand the difficulty of starting a business. I also understand all the hard work and dedication it takes to make a business successful.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I'm human too!
lender.occupational_info: I study sociology at Western Oregon University and for work I tutor middle and high school students.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I would like to leave this world more than what I have taken from it.

lender.name: Emily
lender.occupation: Duke University School of Law Employee
lender.loan_because: I want to help. I want to help others, I want to help the world, I just want to help.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be successful in their entrepreneurial ventures.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies build systems to make their processes more efficient.

lender.name: CarmenK
lender.loan_because: I love and support

lender.name: Maami
lender.loan_because: In my opinion everyone has something valuable to contribute to the world. I would like to give this chance to more people, so their contribution could make us one step closer for having a better world for all of us.I was just fortunate enough to have been born in the right place at the right time. I would like to help people who haven't been as fortunate.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I don't see any point in keeping any money I don't need. I donate my spare money to various charities, and I feel that kiva is an excellent way to make the donation go a very long way.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: Not everyone has a fortunate life.
lender.occupational_info: Work with people in large organisations.

lender.name: Koran jualbeli
lender.loan_because: the good thing will coming back to you.
lender.occupational_info: Public services with free classified ads.

lender.name: Dawn & Regina
lender.loan_because: Because we believe in a global community and value hard work and determination. Everyone has to start somewhere and microloans provide that opportunity
lender.occupational_info: Dawn is in her second year of law school and Regina works as a financial planner.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can help people to have a business.

lender.name: Natalia
lender.loan_because: Everything that lives, lives not alone, nor for itself. - William Blake
lender.occupational_info: Help people find money to buy a home

lender.name: Rev. Michael R. Bartley
lender.loan_because: the world is in need of us to act with hope.
lender.occupational_info: I am a United Methodist Clergy person.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: To help people who just need a little help. I think this is a great way to be able to do something when there are times when you think what can I do. This is a great thing/
lender.occupational_info: I was in the Navy and now I am going to sxhool to become a person who works in a sleep clinic.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: The developing world is the best place to affect change. To vote with my micro-resources (ha!) for the projects I believe in.
lender.occupational_info: I manage technology projects for my employer. Whenever possible, I get out to new destinations to experience the insightful and innovative people and projects that truly inspire hope for the future.

lender.name: yoshi
lender.loan_because: I was in Tanzania ,Mtwara as a volunteer of computer technician and instructor for six months for Japanese government program. It brought me great change of my life. That experience give me the knowledge about what is important in my life which has been limited.
lender.occupational_info: My job is managing company of private fund in Singapore.

lender.name: ahmad
lender.loan_because: Mud that tragedy befall us in the city sidoarjo have created misery and disaster that will stop sometime. the government is expected to assist the victims are still tight-lipped as if no care about the suffering that occurred. economic activity prior to the event and the potential is very enthusiastic now no measurable slump ..... but we must be aware of life continue to run even very heavy. we believe that there will be a positive solution if we want to always strive and work hard. life is a challenge ..... thanks
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultant children's education. Children are the future of the world .... that is the principle that I hold the firm .... with approximately 30 children who become participants, I wanted to teach and develop the stock at the same time providing education and experience to them. therefore I would appreciate the generous help to me, who are willing to educate them through the various economic activities that will make them independent and does not cleave expect mercy of others ... let us support the children for the future of the world .. ..

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I hope that a little help can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: My husband & I are self employed and run a fencing business. I lend to others enthusiastic about improving their lives through their own efforts.

lender.name: Lawrence Chan
lender.loan_because: Is the best way to get to people that have no access to financial institution
lender.occupational_info: finance

lender.name: Norman
lender.loan_because: I believe that Jesus would have us care for the poor and that micro loans help people to become independent and able to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach about the love of God found in Jesus the annointed one who came to die for the things which lacked love and was raised again to show us that we can be forgiven for not always acting in love. I ask people to consider the claims of Jesus the annointed one and accept him as their prophet, priest, and king. I also comfort people with broken hearts and family lives.
